summary: Documentary following the Ozzfest Tour in 1999, with live music and interviews interspersed. Featuring the band members from Black Sabath, Primus, Slayer, Rob Zombie, Buckethead, System of a Down and others.
cast: Tom Araya|Blasko|Paul Bostaph|Buckethead|Geezer Butler|Les Claypool|Shawn Crahan|Sully Erna|Chris Fehn|Paul Gray|Jeff Hanneman|Tony Iommi|Craig Jones|Joey Jordison|Kerry King|Daron Malakian|Brain Mantia|Robbie Merrill|Geoff Nicholls|Shavo Odadjian|Jack Osbourne|Kelly Osbourne|Ozzy Osbourne|Sharon Osbourne|Riggs|Tony Rombola|James Root|Tommy Stewart|Serj Tankian|Corey Taylor|John Tempesta|Mick Thomson|Arto Tunçboyaciyan|Zakk Tyler|Bill Ward|Sid Wilson|Rob Zombie
keywords: title directed by female|rock 'n' roll|thrash metal|death metal|outdoor concert
title: We Sold Our Souls for Rock 'n Roll
